application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.2 Scots Pine - Deadwood & remove stumps.G.3 Yew and Holly - Crown lift to 3m from ground level.G.5 Holly - Cut back to curb line & crown lift to 2m from ground level.T.7 English Oak - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points providing 1m clearance from adjacent lamp. Remove limb at 9m to south, deadwood & remove any hanging broken limbs.T.8 Horse Chestnut - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points providing clearance from wires & deadwood. T.9 Magnolia grandiflora - Fell.
